Speedy - YouTube Playback Speed Controller

Enhance Your YouTube Experience! 

Speedy is the ultimate tool for YouTube enthusiasts, providing seamless playback speed control and more. Designed with convenience and customization in mind, this extension empowers you to watch videos at your preferred pace while offering additional features to improve your browsing experience.

Features

Quick Playback Speed Control: Instantly switch between speeds (0.5x to 3x) with dedicated buttons integrated into YouTubeâ€™s video controls.
Site-Specific Toggle: Easily enable or disable the extension on YouTube with a simple toggle button.
Developer Details: Learn about the creators behind this extension in an elegant popup interface.
User-Friendly Interface: Modern design with intuitive controls for effortless use.
Why Choose Speedy?
Focused Functionality: Works exclusively on YouTube to ensure an optimized experience.
Customizable Experience: Adjust playback speeds with just one click, perfect for fast learners or detailed viewers.
Lightweight and Efficient: Small, responsive, and designed for hassle-free usage.
